name: MorseConverter
tagline: Converts letters and numbers to Morse Code and vice-versa. WIP
body:
# MorseConverter
Converts letters and numbers to Morse Code and vice-versa. WIP

To run:

`$ ./morse.py`

`Enter your string: <input in English>`

`<output in morse code>`

morse.py will only work when given the letters `a-z`, digits `1-9`, and the special characters `?`, `,`, and `.`. All other characters will result in an error.

# TODO:

* Accept command line arguments

* Convert from morse to strings

* Break up large blocks of text so as to not overwhelm the screen
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
